What are the treatments for 9q22.3 microdeletion ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of 9q22.3 microdeletion:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: 9q22.3 Microdeletion  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Nevoid Basal Cell Carcinoma Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Gorlin syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Basal Cell Nevus Syndrome   These
